message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to let it go for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm only willing to pay $100 for the product. It's my maximum budget, and I'm confident it's a fair price.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $180 might be a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $140 for the product. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $140, but it's still a bit more than I can afford. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. This is a fair compromise, and it's the absolute maximum I can pay right now.

I understand that $140 was still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more. I can do $130 for the product. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
